allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add admin panel with hierarchical navigation and body section editor

Major Features:
- Admin authentication system with JWT
- Hero section editor with image upload (up to 50MB)
- Body section editor with CRUD functionality
- Hierarchical admin navigation menu (페이지 관리 > 히어로/바디)
- Backend API with increased payload limits

Frontend:
- React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion animations
- Admin dashboard with modern UI
- Real-time preview for hero section edits
- Image/video upload support (GIF, MP4)

Backend:
- Node.js Express server (Simple CMS)
- File-based JSON storage
- JWT authentication
- CORS enabled
- Increased payload limit to 50MB

Admin Pages:
- Dashboard (/admin)
- Hero Editor (/admin/hero)
- Body Editor (/admin/body)
- Navigation Manager (/admin/navigation)
- Settings (/admin/settings)

Changes:
- Remove unnecessary admin categories (media, users, analytics)
- Implement collapsible menu structure for better UX
- Add background image support for hero section
- Fix backend image upload size limits

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'until curl -s http://localhost:8080/ > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done && curl -s http://localhost:8080/')
